dmca.title: Offensive/Slanderous Material on teenqueens.net causing harm & damage to family.
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Christopher Rumpf [mailto:crumpf@parallel-evolution.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 10, 2007 8:35 PM
To: Copyright
Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org; 'Christopher Rumpf'
Subject: RE: Offensive/Slanderous Material on teenqueens.net causing
harm & damage to family.


Attached you find the proper DMCA form with further
justification/reasoning.  The domain named teenqueens.net does not own
the copyrights to these photos.
 
Please proceed with our claim and let us konw if anything else is needed
on our behalf.
 
Thank you for your time.
-Chris & Jennifer


________________________________

From: Copyright [mailto:copyright@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, January 09, 2007 8:37 AM
To: crumpf@parallel-evolution.com
Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org
Subject: FW: Offensive/Slanderous Material on teenqueens.net causing
harm & damage to family.


To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: Christopher Rumpf [mailto:crumpf@parallel-evolution.com] 
Sent: Monday, January 08, 2007 6:40 PM
To: abuse; Copyright
Subject: Offensive/Slanderous Material on teenqueens.net causing harm &
damage to family.


Hello,
 
Below you will find a note which I have sent to the owner of the
teenqueens.net domain requesting that some offensive material be
removed.
 
I have received no reply.
The phone number is no longer in service and the e-mail doesn't reply.
I have also sent messages in the snail mail which have not been received
or are being ignored.
 
Can someone with this organization please help Jennifer and I resolve
this issue so we can close this and move forward with our lives?
 
It is our hope that someone within your organization can help us get
this offensive harmful material removed from the intranet as our family
and personal safety is of concern.
 
What is happening is that people are literally fishing/mining for
Jennifer's living address, phone number, city of birth, etc.  Late last
year people actually found out that information and contacted her with
threats of a personal sort.  We would like to have this content removed
from the web and are trying hard to accomplish that but are not
successfull when we can not communicate with the owners of these web
sites.
 
 
Thanks so much,  (the original message can be found below)
/* ---
     Christopher Rumpf
     crumpf@parallel-evolution.com
<mailto:crumpf@parallel-evolution.com> 
     mobile: 619.254.0811
     yim: mrrumpf
--- */
 
 
Polite Request of Removal of "Celeste" from 
http://www.teenqueens.net/galleries/celeste.html
 
Hello,

My name is Christopher Rumpf. I am working with Celeste (Jennifer) to
get her adult content removed from the internet. We have contacted the
owners of the media (www.cumfiesta.com <outbind://41/www.cumfiesta.com>
) and they have graciously removed her content from their pay service
web site. We are now following up with all of the various promoters of
the cumfiesta.com website politely asking that they remove their photos
of Celeste because she is no longer available for download on the main
website.

Would it be possible for you and your team of admins to remove these
URLs and move the photo's/movies into a private non public_html folder?
(The moving of the photo's into a non public_html folder will stop
google/yahoo image searches from returning the content after the .html
pages are removed) http://www.teenqueens.net/galleries/celeste.html
<http://www.teenqueens.net/galleries/celeste.html> 

Or perhaps replace Celeste's pages with another model/woman?

The reason we are working on this is due to her personal safety. She has
been attacked twice in 2006 by stalkers and her general safety is of
concern to us. People are crazy out there and we no longer want this
poor decision which she made when she was 20 years old to continue to
effect our family and life. Since the www.cumfiesta.com
<outbind://41/www.cumfiesta.com>  web site is no longer selling her
adult content would you please be so kind as to remove it from your
promoting site?

We been working directly with RK Netmedia on this...specifically
Mauricio Botero. If you would like to contact him directly to confirm
all of this that is ok too. Here is Mauricio's contact information:

=======================================

Mauricio (Mo) Botero

RK Netmedia, Inc.

Ph: 305.695.6700

Fax: 305. 695.6701

E-mail: mo@equantum.com

=======================================

We would graciously appreciate any help you can provide us on this
matter.

Thank you so much for your time & have a great new year,

/* ---

Christopher Rumpf

crumpf@parallel-evolution.com

mobile: 619.254.0811

yim: mrrumpf

--- */

======================================================
